text: William Semple (26 November 1861 - 11 February 1940) was a Scottish footballer who played as a left back. ==Career== Born in Cambuslang, Semple played club football for Cambuslang, and made one appearance for Scotland in 1886. He captained the Scotland team on his debut. ==References== Category:1861 births Category:1940 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Cambuslang F.C. players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Place of death missing
title: William Semple
